data.name: 0000 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What took you all so long?

data.name: 0001 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As we left the clubroom, Haruhi was outside waiting for us.

data.name: 0002 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's not like she had any reason to wait.

data.name: 0003 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What were you doing, Kyon?

data.name: 0004 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You should at least respect brigade orders.

data.name: 0005 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It doesn't feel good hearing that from you, who runs around doing as you please.

data.name: 0006 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Considering you always seem to be going off course, why would anyone want to follow you?

data.name: 0007 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you can't do anything without an order, you'll always remain a low-ranking member.

data.name: 0008 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Now I want to say it out loud to her face.

data.name: 0010 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How about we ask the computer society mem- bers about it before going to the music room?

data.name: 0011 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ugh… You're right.

data.name: 0012 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Thinking about it, I still haven't complained to them about earlier.

data.name: 0013 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He didn't say "complain," he said "ask."

data.name: 0014 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well then, let's stop by the computer society before we head to the music room.

data.name: 0017 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're back!

data.name: 0019 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Wha?!

data.name: 0020 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Y-you're here again?!

data.name: 0021 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's not how you greet someone now, is it?

data.name: 0022 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm your guest, so how about you treat me politely?

data.name: 0023 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You've got some nerve—suddenly barging in and asking to be treated as a guest.

data.name: 0024 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First of all, there's something I want to tell you guys!

data.name: 0025 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Do not lie to me with your testimonials ever again.

data.name: 0026 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Wh-what are you talking about?!

data.name: 0027 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There was no class 1-10 to be found anywhere.

data.name: 0028 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Instead, we've just proved that you lot are all idiots.

data.name: 0029 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: That's not true! How horrible!

data.name: 0030 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's absolutely right.

data.name: 0031 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: However, no matter what you tell Haruhi, in the end it'll come to nothing. That's a fact.

data.name: 0032 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You guys need to reflect on what you've done and act properly from here on out.

data.name: 0033 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Eek… How unreasonable…

data.name: 0034 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Yep, absolutely.

data.name: 0035 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So where's the person who claimed there was a phenomenon at the music room?

data.name: 0037 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: Th-that's me…

data.name: 0038 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay, so how about you tell us all about it?

data.name: 0039 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In the first place, what were you doing that lead you there?

data.name: 0041 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: There's something we're working on in secret at the moment.

data.name: 0042 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: He's in charge of the music.

data.name: 0043 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In secret, hmm…?

data.name: 0044 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Eek… I'm just going to let you know, I can't tell you any details, so—

data.name: 0045 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't care, I don't have any interest in what you guys are making.

data.name: 0046 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, unless it's an earth-destroying bomb made in plans to overthrow the state.

data.name: 0047 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no way a single highschool club could make such a thing.

data.name: 0048 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What even is that weapon? The more you think about it, the more troubling it sounds—

data.name: 0049 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While retorting such in my head, Haruhi's questioning continued.

data.name: 0050 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So, when did you hear the music?

data.name: 0051 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I think it was 2 o'clock, but…

data.name: 0052 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm not asking you.

data.name: 0053 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ugh…

data.name: 0055 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: While heading to the music room, I suddenly heard music coming from out of nowhere.

data.name: 0058 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: I thought there might be someone in the music room, so I tried to open the door, but…

data.name: 0059 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: It was locked.

data.name: 0060 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: So I opened the door in a hurry, and when I looked inside…

data.name: 0061 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There was no one there.

data.name: 0062 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0063 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: The performance abruptly stopped as well.

data.name: 0066 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This isn't a mishearing or anything?

data.name: 0067 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: Absolutely not!

data.name: 0068 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: I've been going to the music room every day at the same time for the past few days!

data.name: 0069 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: Every time, I hear the music…

data.name: 0070 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: And I think… Wow! It's happening again! I can hear that song again!

data.name: 0071 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Looks like we've gotten everything out of him.

data.name: 0072 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah, and it doesn't feel like he's lying.

data.name: 0073 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This is looking hopeless…

data.name: 0074 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just from listening to his recount—it's faultless. It's unmistakably an unnatural phenomenon.

data.name: 0075 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unlike with class 1-10, it doesn't look like she'll be satisfied with it just being a mistake.

data.name: 0076 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right now, it's about 1 o'clock, right…

data.name: 0077 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's a bit before 2, but let's head to the music room anyway.

data.name: 0078 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, don't you want to hear more of what he has to say?

data.name: 0079 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You can do the rest. Get us all the details.

data.name: 0080 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Me?!

data.name: 0083 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Are you staying behind, Yuki?

data.name: 0085 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato responded with a mere 2 centimeter deep nod.

data.name: 0087 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I would also like to hear more, so…

data.name: 0088 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay, well I'm heading off ahead then.

data.name: 0089 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Let's go, Mikuru.

data.name: 0090 (392.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay—

data.name: 0091 (392.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I'm gonna go with Haru-nyan as well!

data.name: 0092 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Koizumi.

data.name: 0093 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0094 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What are you planning?

data.name: 0095 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, what could you be talking about?

data.name: 0096 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't play dumb.

data.name: 0097 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You wouldn't take your eyes off of Haruhi for no reason, right?

data.name: 0098 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How very astute of you. Indeed, it is exactly as you say.

data.name: 0099 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Did something catch your attention?

data.name: 0100 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What caught my attention was—Miss Nagato.

data.name: 0101 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato?

data.name: 0102 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Specifically, I don't believe Miss Nagato way stay behind for no reason.

data.name: 0103 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's a good point, I guess…

data.name: 0106 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But that doesn't mean I understand what she's thinking.

data.name: 0107 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Then, do you lot that stayed behind still need something?

data.name: 0108 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well…

data.name: 0109 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi told me to ask more questions, but honestly I'm not sure what I should ask…

data.name: 0110 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You guys are going to go to the music room after this anyway, right?

data.name: 0111 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, well…

data.name: 0112 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If Haruhi tells us to do something, we don't really have the right to refuse.

data.name: 0113 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Tell your Brigade Chief to stay out until 2 o'clock.

data.name: 0114 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We're really tight on our work so every minute counts right now.

data.name: 0115 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Umm… Prez.

data.name: 0116 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Hm? What?

data.name: 0117 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I wasn't sure if I should say or not, but…

data.name: 0118 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: What is it? Just say it.

data.name: 0119 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Yesterday, I used the music room from 3 o'clock…

data.name: 0120 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Huh? Y-you did?

data.name: 0121 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It was only starting from today that I can use the music room at 2 o'clock.

data.name: 0122 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Up until yesterday, the light music club were using the room in the morning, right?

data.name: 0123 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: N-now you mention it…

data.name: 0124 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hold on a second.

data.name: 0125 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, yesterday you actually heard the music at 3 o'clock?

data.name: 0126 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Y-yeah. Seems so.

data.name: 0127 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But the light music club was using it before?

data.name: 0128 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Th-that's right. I completely forgot about that…

data.name: 0129 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So wouldn't that mean the light music club was playing the piano?

data.name: 0132 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That doesn't seem to be the case based on his recount.

data.name: 0133 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: When he heard the music, the music room was locked.

data.name: 0134 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Furthermore, he could hear it until the moment he entered the room.

data.name: 0135 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is that right…

data.name: 0136 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: But it may be a blessing with regards to the time.

data.name: 0137 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean?

data.name: 0138 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's simple.

data.name: 0139 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It means our methods of keeping Miss Suzumiya away are not limited to location.

data.name: 0140 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The phenomenon actually occurred at 3 o'clock.

data.name: 0141 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, Miss Suzumiya believes it was at 2 o'clock…

data.name: 0142 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …I see, so that's what you mean.

data.name: 0143 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi thinks it happened at 2 o'clock.

data.name: 0144 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But it actually happened at 3 o'clock.

data.name: 0145 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we can use that 1 hour time difference to our advantage…

data.name: 0146 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We can have Haruhi confirm the phenomenon not occurring for herself.

data.name: 0147 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Hopefully.

data.name: 0148 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We're going to keep her away just by chance.

data.name: 0149 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Certainly, if we keep investigating for another hour, Haruhi will get bored.

data.name: 0150 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's best we kept this information about the time to ourselves.

data.name: 0151 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm… What's this?

data.name: 0152 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Seems like some kind of melody.

data.name: 0153 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Again…?

data.name: 0154 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Again?

data.name: 0155 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Take a look.

data.name: 0156 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After Koizumi's prompt I redirect my gaze…

data.name: 0159 (392.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: #SK0U-ugh… I need to write… I need to finish this quickly…

data.name: 0160 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What…?

data.name: 0161 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The club member we were just talking to was writing something single-mindedly.

data.name: 0163 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It looks like he's writing sheet music.

data.name: 0164 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: President… What's up with him?

data.name: 0166 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Well, he's also tight on schedule.

data.name: 0167 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: He's been like this since yesterday.

data.name: 0168 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What music is this?

data.name: 0169 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: That's him as well.

data.name: 0170 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: He should've gone to sample the sound of the piano, but he recorded this.

data.name: 0171 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Though, playing it loudly in the clubroom doesn't help us work.

data.name: 0172 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Even if we warn him, he won't stop the music…

data.name: 0173 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Yesterday it was so bad that we had to work in the computer room.

data.name: 0174 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: It's not like we can blame him though.

data.name: 0175 (392.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We left him in charge of all the music after all…

data.name: 0176 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess…

data.name: 0177 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What instrument is this though? It sounds monotonous, but strangely familiar…

data.name: 0178 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's most likely the sound of a music box.

data.name: 0179 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's recorded as an audio file and is being played back through the computer.

data.name: 0180 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ahh, I see.

data.name: 0181 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So that's why it sounded familiar.

data.name: 0185 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? What is it, Nagato?

data.name: 0186 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: We should leave.

data.name: 0187 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What…?

data.name: 0188 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what's going on all of a sudden?

data.name: 0189 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Hurry.

data.name: 0190 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Let's go.

data.name: 0191 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If Miss Nagato says as such, I wouldn't recommend we take it lightly.

data.name: 0192 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: G-got it.

data.name: 0193 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's nothing to take lightly? I have a bad feeling about this.

data.name: 0195 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, how far are we going?

data.name: 0197 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato dragged us away from the computer society, being unusually forceful.

data.name: 0198 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She stopped suddenly once we'd gotten far enough away.

data.name: 0199 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: We're safe here.

data.name: 0200 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm glad to hear it, but what do you mean safe?

data.name: 0201 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Staying in that room in that circumstance was risky.

data.name: 0202 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean? Was there something wrong over there?

data.name: 0203 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: To be precise—that music.

data.name: 0204 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So it's as I thought…

data.name: 0205 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, don't just leave me in the dark, you two.

data.name: 0206 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's this about the music?

data.name: 0207 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Listening to it causes certain behaviors to install onto your brain as a program.

data.name: 0208 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So it's similar to hypnosis?

data.name: 0209 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The effect is the same.

data.name: 0210 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, doesn't that mean we've been hypnotized as well?

data.name: 0211 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There are no problems if you do not listen for a certain amount of time.

data.name: 0212 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll just take that as I don't need to worry.

data.name: 0213 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But, hold on a second.

data.name: 0214 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So the guys at the computer research society…

data.name: 0215 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's most likely already too late.

data.name: 0216 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right…

data.name: 0217 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, who's responsible for all this?

data.name: 0218 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Not enough information. At the present point I'm unable to identify.

data.name: 0219 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't quite get it, but it's too much for even you, Nagato?

data.name: 0220 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: That music doesn't function perfectly as a behavioral program.

data.name: 0221 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The information in certain frequencies has been intentionally removed.

data.name: 0222 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What are those frequencies?

data.name: 0223 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The sound in the inaudible frequency range.

data.name: 0224 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The inaudible frequency range… So that's what it is.

data.name: 0225 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry—can't you explain it in a way that even I understand?

data.name: 0226 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In other words—because it's become data.

data.name: 0227 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean?

data.name: 0228 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Do you listen to music on a computer?

data.name: 0229 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, not really…

data.name: 0230 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In that case, you might not understand straight away.

data.name: 0231 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Let's say you're importing a CD onto a computer—

data.name: 0232 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The truth is—various sounds from that music are removed.

data.name: 0233 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The removed sounds are usually those of frequencies which human ears cannot perceive.

data.name: 0234 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Though, just because we cannot perceive them does not mean they didn't exist originally.

data.name: 0235 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So because those sounds were removed, the hypnosis effect is incomplete?

data.name: 0236 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0237 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In other words—if it were fully functioning, just hearing a little bit of it would be bad.

data.name: 0238 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Most likely.

data.name: 0239 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This is no joke. That was a recording, right?

data.name: 0240 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In other words—there's got to be an origin of that sound somwhere.

data.name: 0241 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed—and as for the location of that original sound…

data.name: 0242 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The music room, huh.

data.name: 0243 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait—that's where Haruhi is right now, isn't it?!

data.name: 0244 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed—we'd better hurry and meet up with them.

data.name: 0247 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi!

data.name: 0248 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Kyon? You're done already?

data.name: 0249 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You did properly interview them, right?

data.name: 0250 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-yeah.

data.name: 0251 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thank god—we were able to meet up with Haruhi before she went inside the music room.

data.name: 0252 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So—did you find anything out?

data.name: 0253 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No…

data.name: 0254 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It'd be most convenient not to tell her she's expecting it an hour early.

data.name: 0255 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just one thing.

data.name: 0256 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just that the light music club were using the music room before the computer society.

data.name: 0257 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Until what time?

data.name: 0258 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think they said until noon.

data.name: 0259 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right… Which would mean there's a high chance it's got nothing to do with this case.

data.name: 0260 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What else?

data.name: 0261 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, there wasn't exactly any other new information.

data.name: 0262 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Really?

data.name: 0263 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You were interviewing them seriously, right?

data.name: 0264 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You always doubt me, but do I really look that much like a slacker?

data.name: 0265 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ah whatever.

data.name: 0266 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We were just discussing the cause.

data.name: 0267 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The cause?

data.name: 0268 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This is the risen ghost of a musician that fated an untimely death!

data.name: 0269 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I shouldn't have to remind you, but we're in a school, you know?

data.name: 0270 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why would the ghost of a musician or whatever appear here?

data.name: 0271 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay—a student who was aiming to become a pianist that fated an untimely death then.

data.name: 0272 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Probably a beautiful but fragile young girl.

data.name: 0273 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why though?

data.name: 0274 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Where did this whole idea of it being a beutiful girl come from in the first place?

data.name: 0275 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No matter where or when—it's always the beautiful girls or boys who die young.

data.name: 0276 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Who decided on that house rule?

data.name: 0277 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, it'll all become clear when we go in.

data.name: 0278 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Once again heading straight off on her own…

data.name: 0279 (392.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, Kyon.

data.name: 0280 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's wrong, Asahina?

data.name: 0281 (392.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It really is all because she read my book…

data.name: 0282 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: どうせただの思いつきですよ

data.name: 0283 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 朝比奈さんは、気にしないで ください

data.name: 0284 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: しかし、その思いつきが事態を 少々面倒にする可能性がある

data.name: 0285 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: そうは思いませんか？

data.name: 0286 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺がせっかく朝比奈さんをフォロー したというのにコイツは……

data.name: 0287 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 先ほども１年１０組と人喰い教室 ２つの話を結びつけてしまいました

data.name: 0288 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 今回も同様のことが起らないとは 限りません

data.name: 0289 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: また、ハルヒのせいで余計に悪化 するってことか

data.name: 0290 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 悪化、という単語が正確とは 言い切れませんが

data.name: 0291 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 状況に大きな変化が起ることは 間違いないでしょうね

data.name: 0292 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: くそ……ほんとに厄介な

data.name: 0293 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: などと、ぼやいていてもどうにも ならないのは分かっている

data.name: 0294 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: とにかく、ハルヒを追いかける

data.name: 0295 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 今はあいつから目を離さないこと くらいしかできないからな

data.name: 0299 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 先に行ったはずのハルヒは音楽室の 扉を睨み付けて立っていた

data.name: 0300 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: どうした？ こんなとこで ボーっと突っ立って

data.name: 0301 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: もしかして、中に入るのが怖い のか？

data.name: 0302 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: そんなわけないでしょ！

data.name: 0303 (392.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: カギがかかってるのー

data.name: 0304 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……ああ、そりゃそうか

data.name: 0305 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: コンピ研の部員も、カギをかけたと 言っていたしな

data.name: 0306 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 休みの間は出入り自由、というわけ にはいかないだろう

data.name: 0307 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: それじゃあ仕方ないな

data.name: 0308 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: まあ、あきらめて帰ろうぜ

data.name: 0309 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 何言ってるのよ、キョン？

data.name: 0310 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ないなら、借りてくればいいだけ じゃない

data.name: 0311 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: そりゃまったくだ

data.name: 0312 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 誰も入れないはずなのに、中から 音楽が聞こえてきた……

data.name: 0313 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: これは密室事件だわ！

data.name: 0314 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: おいおい、いい加減にしてくれ

data.name: 0315 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: どうしてそう話をでたらめに転がす んだ……お前というやつは

data.name: 0316 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: でたらめかどうかは、中を調べたら 判るわよ

data.name: 0317 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 誰か、カギを借りてきてちょうだい

data.name: 0318 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 涼宮さんはどうされるのですか？

data.name: 0319 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: あたしはこの音楽室やピアノに まつわる事件がないか調べてみるわ

data.name: 0320 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: そうだ、ここに残って張り込みをす るメンバーも必要ね

data.name: 0321 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: みんながいなくなってる間に ピアノが鳴り出すかもしれないし

data.name: 0322 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 分担は……面倒だから、キョン！ あんたが決めておいて

data.name: 0323 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 俺がか？

data.name: 0324 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: あたしは忙しいのよ

data.name: 0325 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: へいへい、分かったよ

data.name: 0326 (392.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: じゃ、あとよろしくね

data.name: 0327 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 結局は、一刻も早く自分のやりたい ことに向かいたかっただけかよ……

data.name: 0328 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: まあいい、おかげでまた作戦を練る チャンスができた

data.name: 0329 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: この隙に、少し状況を整理しては？

data.name: 0330 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ああ、そうだな

data.name: 0331 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: まず、やらなきゃならんことは…… 音楽室のカギを借りてくること

data.name: 0332 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: それから……

data.name: 0333 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 例の、異常な行動をとっていた コンピ研部員も気になりますね

data.name: 0334 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 確かに

data.name: 0335 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 長門の話では異常行動に駆り立てる 原因となった音源が存在するはずだ

data.name: 0336 (392.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: それを見つけて処分するなりなんな りする必要があるか……

data.name: 0337 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: くそ、やることは山積みってわけか

data.name: 0338 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: とにかく、手分けしてなんとかする しかない

data.name: 0339 (392.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: みんなにも協力してもらうことに なると思います

data.name: 0341 (392.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はい、がんばります

data.name: 0342 (392.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: 了解

data.name: 0343 (392.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: では、分担を決めましょう

data.name: 0344 (392.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: ハルヒについて
